newsitem.title: GERMANY: Frankfurt bourse closes with DAX down below 4,300.
newsitem.headline: Frankfurt bourse closes with DAX down below 4,300.

text.p: German shares declined in floor trading on Monday, as interest rate concerns pushed the DAX index down 111.85 points to 4,296.94, its first close below 4,300 since July 22.
* September DAX future at 4,303, down 55 points
* Main volume levels in bank stocks Dresdner Bank, Commerzbank, Deutsche Bank -- all trading lower. Bayerische Hypobank down 5.1 percent at 72.05
* Siemens also down 3.4 percent at 122.85 marks and Daimler-Benz down 1.3 percent at 147.50.
